oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The End or Beginning? Either Way, the Credits Are Not Rolling Yet!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Capraro, Robert M.
Capraro, Mary Margaret
Leonard, Jacqueline
Lewis, Chance
Grant, Melva
James, Marlon
Mosqueda, Eduardo

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This introductory piece to this special issue of the Journal of Urban Mathematics Education discusses important publication information for the journal for the year 2020, such as publication goals, average time to acceptance, and acceptance rates. The editorial team also introduces a new voluntary demographics survey for the journal and discusses the importance of collecting pertinent data for identifying and combating bias in the editorial process.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Journal of Urban Mathematics Education; Vol. 14 No. 1 (2021): May 2021, Special Issue – I, Too, Am America! Teaching Mathematics for Empowerment; 1–11
